Posts.Content: Cherylynn wrote: I WAS DIAGNOSED WITH 2 DIFFERENT TYPES OF BREAST, ON AUGUST 20, 2008, NEUROENDOCRINE (IN THE LYMPH) & INVASIVE DUCTAL.  I HAVE FOUND LOTS OF INFO ON INVASIVE DUCTAL, BUT NOT ON NEUROENDOCRINE BREAST CANCER.  I WOULD APPRECIATE ANYTHING ANYONE CAN TELL ME ABOUT IT.  THANK YOU Dx 8/20/2008, <1cm, Stage II, Grade 2, 8/22 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: ANYBODY OUT THERE THAT HAS NEUROENDOCRINE BREAST CANCER? Cherylynn Harley44

Posts.Content: Oct 15, 2008 02:24AM Cherylynn wrote: TENDER, THE DUCTAL CANCER WAS NOT IN THE LYMPH NODE.  THE SURGICAL BIOPSY SHOWED THAT I ACTUALLY HAD 5 TUMORS.  3 DUCTAL (LARGEST 2.5CM), 2 NEUROENDOCRINE (PRIMARY 3/10CM, LYMPH).  BOTH TYPES OF CANCERS ARE STAGE 2, GRADE 2.  THANK YOU FOR THE INFO.  EVERY ONCE IN AWHILE I JUST WOULD LIKE TO BE ABLE TO COMFIRM WHAT I'VE BEEN TOLD.  I FEEL LIKE I HAVE BEEN CAUGHT UP IN A WHIRLWIND.  I WENT TO THE DR. ON A MONDAY, TUESDAY HAD A MAMAGRAM, ECHOGRAM, & NEEDLE BIOPSY. WEDNESDAY THE PATHOLIGIST CALLED ME AND TOLD ME I HAD BREAST CANCER.  THURSDAY I TALKED TO THE SURGEON.  FRIDAY I HAD A MRI.  THE FOLLOWING TUESDAY I SAW THE SURGEON TO DISCUSS SURGERY.  THURSDAY I MET WITH THE ONCOLOGIST & WENT TO THE HOSPITAL FOR CHEST XRAYS & TO PREADMIT.  WEDNESDAY OF THE NEXT WEEK I HAD SURGERY.  SINCE  AUGUST THE 18, I HAVE BEEN TO SEE A DOCTOR 26 TIMES.  ONCE IN A WHILE I COME OUT OF THAT WHIRLWIND AND GET SCARED.   THE MORE I LEARN SEEMS TO SUBSIDE THE FEAR. THANK YOU AGAIN,  CHERYL
Posts.Title: ANYBODY OUT THERE THAT HAS NEUROENDOCRINE BREAST CANCER? Cherylynn Harley44

Posts.Content: Oct 12, 2008 08:16PM Cherylynn wrote: I HAVE A PORT, DO THEY GIVE THE FLU SHOT THROUGH IT? THANK YOU!
Posts.Title: Flu Shots DianeCA dreamwriter

Posts.Content: Oct 13, 2008 12:22AM Cherylynn wrote: FROM MY UNDERSTANDING NEUROENDOCRINE BREAST CANCER HAS NEVER BEEN FOUND BEFORE IT HAD ENTERED A VITAL ORGAN.  I HAD A PET SCAN DONE, IT DIDN'T SHOW ANY OTHER MOVEMENT.  THIS BREAST CANCER WOULD NOT HAVE BEEN FOUND IF THE INVASIVE DUCTAL CANCER HAD NOT BEEN DETECTED, THE DOCTOR THOUGHT IT WAS ALSO IN MY LYMPH.  BOTH NEEDLE AND SURGICAL BIOPSY  SHOWED NEUROENDOCRINE LOCATED IN LYMPH.  THE PRIMARY WAS 3/10 CM & TOOK A WHILE TO FIND IN THE BREAST.  THE FEW CASES ON THE INTERNET ABOUT THIS TYPE OF BREAST CANCER SHOWS THEIR AGE TO BE 60-70 YEARS, AND HAD MOVED OUT OF THE TISSUE INTO ORGANS?  THERE HAS TO BE SOMEONE WHO KNOWS MORE? THANKS FOR YOUR REPLIES!  CHERYL
Posts.Title: ANYBODY OUT THERE THAT HAS NEUROENDOCRINE BREAST CANCER? Cherylynn Harley44
